title: Bug 10532DCR: Table.setSelection(int, int)  order matters
description: Bug 10532DCR: Table.setSelection(int, int)order matters Build 20020226In a call to Table.setSelection(int start, int end), it matters in which orderthe arguments are given.It assumes start <= end.It would be more resilient if it also allowed start = end.If it doesn't allow this, the spec should indicate the ordering requirement.
